intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What is your favorite family story?
What is your favorite book genre?
Where do you want to travel?

respond_situations.starter_line: Happy birthday! Are you having a party?
respond_situations.description: You meet your friend on their birthday.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. Choose a drink.
You see a shirt in a shop. Ask about the price.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You are with your friend. You want help with your bag. ..
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.

listening_script.text: We do a science experiment. We mix water and salt. The salt dissolves in the water. This makes a solution. It is very interesting.

questions.question: When do we do the experiment?

follow_up_questions.question: What do you like to do with your classmates?
When do you see your classmates?
How many classmates do you have?
